actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for projects to develop or demonstrate programs designed to rehabilitate elderly patients of long-term health care facilities or to assist such patients in attaining self-care.

summary.text: Authorizes grants for projects to develop or demonstrate programs designed to rehabilitate elderly patients of long-term health care facilities or to assist such patients in attaining self-care. Authorizes to be appropriated $5,000,000 for fiscal year 1974 and $10,000,000 for fiscal years 1975, 1976, and 1977 to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for projects to develop or demonstrate programs designed to rehabilitate elderly patients of long-term health care facilities or to assist such patients in attaining self-care.
